title: How to thank someone formal email - Quora

response.answer_text: Thankyou for your message, let me review it and I will be in touch. Pompously “I was filled with much delight that you, kind sir, took the time to send me such an inspiring and thought filled message. Please allow me, if you will, your most valued patience and in brief I will give you my most courteous response.”
Thank you note as the subject title Dear (Mr./Ms/Mrs) I want to express my thankfulness to you for……dadadadada. Best regards. Your full name and surname
